column4: hi there, i have a php (fork) problem only under ubuntu. any php experts here
again: ANY PHP EXPERTS HERE? I'VE A PROCESS FORK PROBLEM ONLY UNDER UBUNTU!
no problems with same setup under suse
ok, no php exterts here ... bye
But your shouting has put you in the back of the queue. I'll be with you shortly.
Meanwhile be a good boy and pastebin a short example of the code you're having trouble with so I can verify the problem.
It's important that you use the exact nickname or many irc clients do not highlight the text and lines may be lost.
Ok, have you got urls for me to look at your code?
Still waiting for those pastebin urls.
I won't be around much longer so this is probably your last chance.
